timeline.bodyText: This TODO doesn't make sense now that we don't extend lucene's FieldType
timeline.author: romseygeek

timeline.bodyText: FieldTypeTestCase extensions that test only equals and hashCode can just be removed entirely.  BinaryFieldType doesn't have any search methods on it, and docvalues are tested in BinaryFieldMapperTests
timeline.author: romseygeek
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,29 +0,0 @@

-package org.elasticsearch.index.mapper;
-
-import java.util.Map;
-
-public class BinaryFieldTypeTests extends FieldTypeTestCase<MappedFieldType> {
-
-    @Override
-    protected MappedFieldType createDefaultFieldType(String name, Map<String, String> meta) {
-        return new BinaryFieldMapper.BinaryFieldType(name, true, meta);
-    }
-}

timeline.bodyText: We check that these modifications block merging in TextFieldMapperTests, so we can safely remove them here - this is just checking the equals implementation, which is now gone.
timeline.author: romseygeek

replies.bodyText: 👍. That is a better place for them.
replies.author: nik9000

timeline.bodyText: I don't think this should have changed, now we're creating RankFeatureFieldType (singular not plural)?
timeline.author: jtibshirani

replies.bodyText: Oh, good catch!  Autocomplete is not always my friend...
replies.author: romseygeek

timeline.bodyText: I'm so happy to see clone go!
timeline.author: nik9000

timeline.bodyText: Yikes! This was never really equality!
timeline.author: nik9000

timeline.bodyText: It might be worth dropping this in a followup. It is just about empty now.
timeline.author: nik9000

replies.bodyText: The mock shard contexts are still pretty widely used, so I think it's worth keeping for now.
replies.author: romseygeek
